person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Man-of-the match Blewett came to the wicket with the total on 70 for two and hit three fours during an untroubled innings lasting 129 minutes .

Let's think step by step.

1. Blewett

This is the named person mentioned in the paragraph. He is the "Man-of-the-match" and came to bat when the team's score was 70 for two runs. The paragraph also mentions that he hit three fours during his innings and batted for 129 minutes.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. Blewett

This is the only clearly identified person entity in the paragraph. All other entities, such as "Man-of-the-match," "total," "two," and "minutes," do not refer to specific people.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
